description: This file defines a custom Flutter widget called TvButtonPrimary, which is a styled button optimized for TV interfaces with focus, hover, and press interactions.

classes.name: TvButtonPrimary
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that represents a primary action button tailored for TV interfaces, supporting focus, hover, and press states with visual feedback.

classes.name: _TvButtonPrimaryState
classes.description: Manages the internal state of TvButtonPrimary, including focus, hover, and press interactions, and builds the widget tree with animated effects.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the TvButtonPrimary widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the button, applying animations, focus, hover, and press effects.
